hits: if possible, very short word for pageviews (to fit into the design)
rank:
list header - position in ranklist (should be a short word or abbreviation to fit into the design)
{{Identical|Rank}}
all:
menu project selector - all projects in this language.
{{Identical|All}}
allLang:
option group in wiki language selector - all languages.
{{Identical|All languages}}
popular:
option group in wiki language selector - popular/most visited languages.
{{Identical|Popular}}
interlang_proj: option group in wiki language selector - international/language independent wikis
other_lang:
option group in wiki language selector - other languages.
{{Identical|Otherlanguages}}
closedWikis: option group in wiki language selector - closed wikis
misc:
option group in wiki language selector - miscellaneous wikis.
{{Identical|Miscellaneous}}
myarea: left menu header - refers to the next 4 menu items
mywatchlists:
left menu - watchlists (the wikipedia name for watchlist, plural).
{{Identical|Watchlist}}
top:
left menu header Top - (TOP 100,000) refers to the next menu item.
{{Identical|Top}}
overall:
left menu - top items over all categories.
{{Identical|Overall}}
discussion:
left menu - top items in category talk (Wikipedia name for namespace talk )
{{Identical|Talk}}
portal:
left menu - top items in category portal (Wikipedia name for namespace portal).
{{Identical|Portal}}
project:
left menu - top items in category project (Wikipedia name for namespace project).
{{Identical|Project}}
category:
left menu - top items in category category (short name for Wikimedia category)
{{Identical|Category}}
template:
left menu - top items in category template (short name for Wikimedia template).
{{Identical|Template}}
files:
left menu - top items in category file (Wikipedia name for file / files)
{{Identical|File}}
specialPage:
left menu - top items in category special pages (Wikipedia name for special page).
{{Identical|Special page}}
helpPage:
left menu - top items in category help page (Wikipedia name for help page)
{{Identical|Help page}}
projectTotals: left menu category which shows the sum of all hit for all selected projects
wikiThanks:
Wikipedia name for thanks action (DankeschÃ¶n, Remerciements etc.)
{{Identical|Thank|plural}}
log:
page info menu (right) - short word or abbreviation for logfile  [[toollabs:wikiviewstats/?page=Berlin]]
{{Identical|Log}}
size:
short word or abbreviation for file size.
{{Identical|Size}}
first:
relates to header: revisions - first page revision.
{{Identical|First}}
last:
relates to header: revisions - last page revision.
{{Identical|Last}}
total:
relates to header: revisions - total page revisions.
{{Identical|Total}}
inPeriod: relates to header: period of time the revisions were made
out:
relates to header: links - outgoing links
{{Identical|Out}}
in:
relates to header: links - incoming links
{{Identical|In}}
external:
relates to header: links - external links.
{{Identical|External}}
semi: relates to header: protection - page is semi protected (autoconfirmed)
complete:
relates to header: protection - page is protected completely (sysop).
{{Identical|Complete}}
active:
relates to header: users - active user
{{Identical|Active}}
rawDataSource:
footer text: raw data source.

Followed by a link pointing to http://dumps-wikimedia.org/
filtersOut: tooltip text of auto filter field
lastUpdate:
message shown on start screen
{{Identical|Last update}}
urlToUserpage: Instruction what to fill in this field
noData: message if there is no data in the search result
searchOnlyTOP: This search was performed only in TOP lists.
tryAgain: Try this search again with other parameters
mycontribsOptin: message in Contribution menu to inform the user about the limit without opt-in
onlyOwnCreatedPages: an option in the Contribution menu
namespaces:
options in the Contribution menu to select desired wiki namespaces user, user talk ...
{{Identical|Namespace}}
historyDataCatchup: Notice: history data is in catching-up process
urlParameter: Instruction message 3 with link to sample URL parameters [[toollabs:wikiviewstats/?nosplash=0]]
hideHints: hide this insruction messages for the ongoing session [[toollabs:wikiviewstats/?nosplash=0]]
optinMsg1: $1 is a link. example: [[toollabs:wikiviewstats/?contribs]] -> enter an invalid username & submit
optinMsg2: $1 is a link. example: [[toollabs:wikiviewstats/?contribs]] -> enter an invalid username & submit
colorScheme: menu config: select the color schema
customBarColors: menu config: select custom bar colors for the bar chart graphics
autofilter: short word for an automatic filtering of results
barchart:
tooltip message chart switcher - bar chart  [[toollabs:wikiviewstats/?page=Wikipedia]]
{{Identical|Bar chart}}
linechart: tooltip message chart switcher - line chart
linechart_filled: tooltip message chart switcher - line chart filled. Example: http://www.jqplot.com/deploy/dist/examples/area.html
searchVariants: link text to show search variants of this page
addToWorkList: tooltip message to add this item to the worklist
removeFromWorklist: tooltip message to remove this item from the worklist
numPageWatchers: Number of page watchers of this single page.
authorMostEdits: Author with most edits. In German Wikpedia: Author with largest text share
statsEntry: $1 = link to the tool. This message is placed on Wikipedia's statistic page. e.g: [[:en:Wikipedia:Statistics]]
